$schema.description: The schema to verify this document against.

options.description: The options of the shell panels.

enable.description:
Enables the wallpaper panel.

Default: true

path.description:
File path to the wallpaper image. May be absolute or relative. If empty or null, the default wallpaper image is used.

Default: ./Assets/Wallpapers/canopy1.png

horizontal_mirror.description:
Mirrors the wallpaper image horizontally, creating a left-to-right flipped background.

Default: false

vertical_mirror.description:
Mirrors the wallpaper image vertically, creating a top-to-bottom flipped background.

Default: false

smooth.description:
Enables smooth filtering when the wallpaper is scaled or transformed, reducing visible pixelation.

Default: true

mipmap.description:
Uses mipmap filtering for the wallpaper when scaling, improving visual quality at varying resolutions.

Default: false

auto_transform.description:
Automatically applies image metadata (such as EXIF orientation) so the wallpaper is displayed correctly.

Default: true

cache.description:
Caches the wallpaper image in memory to improve loading performance.

Default: true

asynchronous.description:
Loads wallpaper images from disk asynchronously to avoid blocking the main UI thread.

Default: true

fill_mode.description:
Controls how the wallpaper image is sized and positioned when its dimensions do not match the screen or background area.

Default: PreserveAspectFit

oneOf.description: Stretches the wallpaper to fill the entire area, ignoring the original aspect ratio.
Scales the wallpaper to fit within the area while preserving its aspect ratio. Empty space may remain.
Scales the wallpaper to fully cover the area while preserving aspect ratio. Parts of the image may be cropped.
Repeats the wallpaper image in both horizontal and vertical directions.
Repeats the wallpaper image vertically while keeping its horizontal size.
Repeats the wallpaper image horizontally while keeping its vertical size.
Centers the wallpaper without scaling and fills remaining space with padding.
Uses the default wallpaper fill behavior.

themes.description: The themes of the shell panels.

background.description:
Color of the wallpaper background. May be either the name of the color or an hexadecimal value.

Default: #111111
